multiHqlReportIndex.hql: select projectid,activitychannelid,dtime, count(transactionid) clickvolume from (select t1.projectid, if(t1.activitychannelid is null, 'none', t1.activitychannelid) activitychannelid, t2.dtime, t1.transactionid from (select projectid,activitychannelid,t.date dtime,transactionid from video.t_cdr_top_useractivityinfo t where substr(t.date, 0, 6) >= substr('{STARTTIME}', 0, 6) and substr(t.date, 0, 6) <= substr('{ENDTIME}', 0, 6) and t.activitytype = 0) t1, (select t.dtime from video.t_bdi_muchtv_video_rundate t where t.dtime > '{STARTTIME}' and t.dtime < '{ENDTIME}') t2 where substr(t1.dtime, 0, 6) = substr(t2.dtime, 0, 6) and t1.dtime <= t2.dtime union all select t1.projectid, 'ALL' activitychannelid, t2.dtime, transactionid from (select projectid,activitychannelid,t.date dtime,transactionid from video.t_cdr_top_useractivityinfo t where substr(t.date, 0, 6) >= substr('{STARTTIME}', 0, 6) and substr(t.date, 0, 6) <= substr('{ENDTIME}', 0, 6) and t.activitytype = 0) t1, (select t.dtime from video.t_bdi_muchtv_video_rundate t where t.dtime > '{STARTTIME}' and t.dtime < '{ENDTIME}') t2 where substr(t1.dtime, 0, 6) = substr(t2.dtime, 0, 6) and t1.dtime <= t2.dtime) tt group by projectid, activitychannelid, dtime

select projectid,activitychannelid,dtime, count(transactionid) keyorderpromotion from (select t1.projectid, if(t1.activitychannelid is null, 'none', t1.activitychannelid) activitychannelid, t2.dtime, t1.transactionid from (select projectid,activitychannelid,t.date dtime,transactionid from video.t_cdr_top_useractivityinfo t where substr(t.date, 0, 6) >= substr('{STARTTIME}', 0, 6) and substr(t.date, 0, 6) <= substr('{ENDTIME}', 0, 6) and t.activitytype = 0 and t.taskstatus = 1 and t.transactionstatus = 1) t1, (select t.dtime from video.t_bdi_muchtv_video_rundate t where t.dtime > '{STARTTIME}' and t.dtime < '{ENDTIME}') t2 where substr(t1.dtime, 0, 6) = substr(t2.dtime, 0, 6) and t1.dtime <= t2.dtime union all select t1.projectid, 'ALL' activitychannelid, t2.dtime, t1.transactionid from (select projectid,activitychannelid,t.date dtime,transactionid from video.t_cdr_top_useractivityinfo t where substr(t.date, 0, 6) >= substr('{STARTTIME}', 0, 6) and substr(t.date, 0, 6) <= substr('{ENDTIME}', 0, 6) and t.activitytype = 0 and t.taskstatus = 1 and t.transactionstatus = 1) t1, (select t.dtime from video.t_bdi_muchtv_video_rundate t where t.dtime > '{STARTTIME}' and t.dtime < '{ENDTIME}') t2 where substr(t1.dtime, 0, 6) = substr(t2.dtime, 0, 6) and t1.dtime <= t2.dtime) tt group by projectid, activitychannelid, dtime

select projectid,activitychannelid,dtime, en_value, zh_value from (select t1.projectid, if(t1.activitychannelid is null,'ALL',t1.activitychannelid) activitychannelid, t1.dtime, if(t2.en_value is null,t1.activitychannelid,t2.en_value) en_value, if(t2.zh_value is null,t1.activitychannelid,t2.zh_value) zh_value from (select * from video.t_video_settlement_channel_cpa_dm_hbase t where t.dtime > '{STARTTIME}' and t.dtime < '{ENDTIME}') t1 left join (select a.projectid,a.channelid,a.en_value,a.zh_value from (select projectid,channelid,en_value,zh_value, row_number() over(partition by projectid,channelid order by lastmodifytime desc ) as rn from video.t_cdr_top_channelinfo t ) a where a.rn=1) t2 on t1.activitychannelid = t2.channelid and t1.projectid = t2.projectid )tt group by projectid,activitychannelid,dtime,en_value,zh_value
